title: (x) "Strange as this Weather Has Been" wide distressed serif - Archive Lightface Extended {Florian}
content:
Anyone? You can’t really tell from the jpeg but the font is slightly distressed. I know the italic is Matrix Script. Some crappy kerning, especially between the W and the e but I like the font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102074940im_/http:/typophile.com/files/51Vd-gPICTL_6158._SS500_.jpg)

 [‹ GOOD magazine typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102074940/http:/typophile.com/node/38664 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Denis Johnson "Tree of Smoke" woodtype-style sans - H&FJ Knockout {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102074940/http:/typophile.com/node/38673 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pattyfab

comments.content: It reminds me of [Craw Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102074940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/craw-modern/) and a bit of [Century Expanded](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102074940/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-expanded/) but it’s none of them...
Aah, yes! That’s it. _WhatTheFont_ is a good tool that one should use more often... ;^)
Thanks, Florian. I use WhatTheFont all the time but I thought this sample was too small/indistinct.
